title: If there is a widespread game DC issue, the lease Riot can do is to temporarily disable leaverbuster
body: Seriously, in light of VERY recent bugsplat and anti-cheat crap, bunch of players including me and my friends were kicked out of game right after the champ select and get bugsplats, lose LP and get leaverbuster. None of us use virtual machine and no solution that Red Tracker offered helped us.
